body_html:
Hello,

I actually built from source the version with the Loader in SavedModelBundle.
However it seems that using SavedModelBundle.withConfigProto(config) doesn't impact anything compared to the "default" configuration.
Code is below :

ConfigProto configProto = ConfigProto.newBuilder()
                .setAllowSoftPlacement(true) // allow less GPUs than configured
                .setGpuOptions(GPUOptions.newBuilder().setPerProcessGpuMemoryFraction(0.01).build())
                .build();

SavedModelBundle  bundle = SavedModelBundle.loader(modelDir).withTags("serve").withConfigProto(configProto.toByteArray()).load();

Am I missing something ?

body:
Hello,

I actually built from source the version with the Loader in SavedModelBundle.
However it seems that using SavedModelBundle.withConfigProto(config) doesn't impact anything compared to the "default" configuration.
Code is below :
```
ConfigProto configProto = ConfigProto.newBuilder()
                .setAllowSoftPlacement(true) // allow less GPUs than configured
                .setGpuOptions(GPUOptions.newBuilder().setPerProcessGpuMemoryFraction(0.01).build())
                .build();

SavedModelBundle  bundle = SavedModelBundle.loader(modelDir).withTags("serve").withConfigProto(configProto.toByteArray()).load();
```

Am I missing something ?
